titleStmt.title: A reply to the Catholick gentlemans answer to the most materiall parts of the booke Of schisme whereto is annexed, an account of H.T. his appendix to his Manual of controversies, concerning the Abbot of Bangors answer to Augustine / by H. Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
